author: scottbw
msg: Updated the P&C functional tests to match the current W3C test suite.

author: scottbw
msg: Catch and handle config.xml that is not well-formed using a BadManifestException rather than a raw stack trace

author: scottbw
msg: Catch null exception if a non-required Feature is supplied with an invalid IRI

author: scottbw
msg: Updated the P&C tests to match the current W3C test suite. I've marked 7 tests as "ignore": dl,bm, and bn seem to be errors in the test widgets themselves; db,de,bf and dr seem to have been removed from the test suite. I've reported these issues to W3C.
